Package ohos.telephony

Class CellularDataInfoManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.telephony.CellularDataInfoManager

  • public class CellularDataInfoManager
extends Object
    Provides methods related to cellular data services.

    This class provides methods for querying and setting the state of cellular data services and monitoring the state.

    Since:
    1

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int DATA_FLOW_TYPE_DORMANT
      Indicates that there is no uplink or downlink data, and the bottom-layer link is in the dormant state.
      static int DATA_FLOW_TYPE_DOWN
      Indicates that there is only downlink data.
      static int DATA_FLOW_TYPE_NONE
      Indicates that there is no uplink or downlink data.
      static int DATA_FLOW_TYPE_UP
      Indicates that there is only uplink data.
      static int DATA_FLOW_TYPE_UPDOWN
      Indicates that there is uplink and downlink data.
      static int DATA_STATE_CONNECTED
      Indicates that a cellular data link is connected.
      static int DATA_STATE_CONNECTING
      Indicates that a cellular data link is being connected.
      static int DATA_STATE_DISCONNECTED
      Indicates that a cellular data link is disconnected.
      static int DATA_STATE_SUSPENDED
      Indicates that a cellular data link is suspended.
      static int DATA_STATE_UNKNOWN
      Indicates that a cellular data link is unknown.

    • Field Detail

      • DATA_FLOW_TYPE_DORMANT

        public static final int DATA_FLOW_TYPE_DORMANT
        Indicates that there is no uplink or downlink data, and the bottom-layer link is in the dormant state.

        It is a return value of service state query of cellular data services.

        Since:
        1
        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static CellularDataInfoManager getInstance​(Context context)
        Obtains a CellularDataInfoManager instance.
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context.
        Returns:
        Returns a CellularDataInfoManager instance.
        Since:
        1

      • getCellularDataFlowType

        public int getCellularDataFlowType​()
        Obtains the uplink and downlink status of cellular data services.
        Returns:
        Returns the uplink and downlink status. There are five types, as specified in DATA_FLOW_TYPE_NONE.
        Since:
        1

      • isCellularDataEnabled

        public boolean isCellularDataEnabled​()
        Checks whether cellular data services are enabled.

        Requires Permission: ohos.permission.GET_NETWORK_INFO.

        Returns:
        Returns true if cellular data services are enabled; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • isCellularDataRoamingEnabled

        public boolean isCellularDataRoamingEnabled​(int slotId)
        Checks whether roaming is enabled for cellular data services.

        Requires Permission: ohos.permission.GET_NETWORK_INFO.

        Parameters:
        slotId - Indicates the ID of a card slot. The value 0 indicates card 1, and the value 1 indicates card 2.
        Returns:
        Returns true if roaming is enabled for cellular data services; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        1

      • getCellularDataState

        public int getCellularDataState​(int slotId)
        Obtains the connection state of the PS domain.

        Requires Permission: ohos.permission.GET_NETWORK_INFO.

        Parameters:
        slotId - Indicates the ID of a card slot. The value 0 indicates card 1, and the value 1 indicates card 2.
        Returns:
        Returns the connection state, which can be any of the following:
        • DATA_STATE_UNKNOWN
        • DATA_STATE_DISCONNECTED
        • DATA_STATE_CONNECTING
        • DATA_STATE_CONNECTED
        • DATA_STATE_SUSPENDED
        Since:
        1

      • getDefaultCellularDataSlotId

        public int getDefaultCellularDataSlotId​()
        Obtains the SIM card where cellular data services are available.
        Returns:
        Returns 0 if cellular data services are available on card 1; returns 1 if they are available on card 2.
        Since:
        1

      • addObserver

        public void addObserver​(CellularDataStateObserver observer,
                        int mask)
        Adds an observer for monitoring cellular data service state changes.

        You must override the CellularDataStateObserver class to register an observer to monitor state changes. When the state changes, the corresponding CellularDataStateObserver instance is invoked to notify the application of the changes.

        Parameters:
        observer - Indicates the observer instance for state monitoring.
        mask - Indicates the state mask to be monitored, which can be either of the following:
        • CellularDataStateObserver#OBSERVE_MASK_DATA_CONNECTION_STATE
        • CellularDataStateObserver#OBSERVE_MASK_DATA_FLOW
        Since:
        1

      • removeObserver

        public void removeObserver​(CellularDataStateObserver observer)
        Removes an observer for monitoring cellular data service state changes.
        Parameters:
        observer - Indicates the observer instance for state monitoring.
        Since:
        1
